title: Create a Cozy Halloween Vibe with John Derian’s Target Collection
description: There’s something so magical about the change in seasons, especially when it comes to decorating for the spooky season. This year, I’m beyond excited to share that the new John Derian Halloween Collection has just arrived at Target! You all know how much I adored his Thanksgiving collection last year (check it out here), and […]
author: Jose Galvan
excerpt: This year, I'm beyond excited to share that the new John Derian Halloween Collection has just arrived at Target.
text: There’s something so magical about the change in seasons, especially when it comes to decorating for the spooky season. This year, I’m beyond excited to share that the new John Derian Halloween Collection has just arrived at Target! You all know how much I adored his Thanksgiving collection last year (check it out here), and let me tell you, this new collection is just as awesome. The Halloween line is the perfect mix of elegant whimsy with a dash of spookiness that will give your home that cozy, haunted vibe we all love. Whether you’re into charming vintage touches or you prefer a more subdued, enchanting feel, this collection has you covered. It’s everything you need to celebrate Halloween with style while keeping things feeling unique and homey.This is an online-only collection, so be sure to hop on Target’s site and check it out before it’s gone. I love that it’s exclusive, which means you can get your hands on some truly special pieces that not everyone will have. If you’re like me and enjoy adding a little festive flair to your spaces while keeping things timeless, you’ll definitely fall in love with this collection.Thank you so much for stopping by the blog; we truly appreciate it here on the farm. Keep up with us daily HERE! Stay Cozy!xxLizMarie
html:
There’s something so magical about the change in seasons, especially when it comes to decorating for the spooky season. This year, I’m beyond excited to share that the new John Derian Halloween Collection has just arrived at Target! You all know how much I adored his Thanksgiving collection last year (check it out here), and let me tell you, this new collection is just as awesome. The Halloween line is the perfect mix of elegant whimsy with a dash of spookiness that will give your home that cozy, haunted vibe we all love. Whether you’re into charming vintage touches or you prefer a more subdued, enchanting feel, this collection has you covered. It’s everything you need to celebrate Halloween with style while keeping things feeling unique and homey.

This is an online-only collection, so be sure to hop on Target’s site and check it out before it’s gone. I love that it’s exclusive, which means you can get your hands on some truly special pieces that not everyone will have. If you’re like me and enjoy adding a little festive flair to your spaces while keeping things timeless, you’ll definitely fall in love with this collection.Thank you so much for stopping by the blog; we truly appreciate it here on the farm. Keep up with us daily HERE! Stay Cozy!

xxLizMarie
